participant_1.background:
I don't know what my weight is, but I'm trying to get healthier.
I am a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage.
i still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.
our kids are 14 and 12 years old.
i love to read romance novels.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.
I'll be running around town for inspiration while my baby monitor keeps an eye on my little one!
my favorite music is jim hendrix.
i am almost finished with my degree.
I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.

content.text: Hello! I'm a writer, and I'm trying to get healthier. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I'm almost finished with my degree in culinary arts and I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams. What kind of writing do you do?
I love to write romance novels, and I'm also working on a suspense novel. I'm trying to get into better shape, too. Do you have any tips for me?
I love romance novels! I find that going for a walk in the park helps me clear my head and get some exercise. I also find that listening to Jim Hendrix while I work helps me stay focused.
I love Jim Hendrix! I'll have to try that. I have a toddler, so I don't have a lot of time for exercise, but I'm trying to get creative with my workouts.
I know how that is! I have a baby monitor that I use when I need to get some work done. It's been a lifesaver!
That's a great idea! I'm going to have to get one of those.
You're welcome! Good luck with your writing and your health!
